name: Ext_R5_TerminologyCapabilities_codeSearch
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TerminologyCapabilities|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The degree to which the server supports the code search parameter on ValueSet, if it is supported.
element.comment: `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch` maps to R4B `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The degree to which the server supports the code search parameter on ValueSet, if it is supported.
element.comment: `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch` maps to R4B `TerminologyCapabilities.codeSearch`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The degree to which the server supports the code search parameter on ValueSet, if it is supported.
